p: Antioxidant activity was estimated using the following chemicals; DPPH reagent was used which is chemically known as 2,2-diphenyl-1-1-picrylhydrazyl and was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Germany), methanol (local filling), and Trolox which is chemically known as ((s)-6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchroman-2-carboxylic acid) and manufactured by Sigma-Aldrich (USA).
